name: ryrysnake
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Just like the ordinary snake game you've played, 

Eat the foods (blinking white dots), and don't eat yourself (squares)!

Follow the tempo and control the snake (so don't forget to turn on the sound)

CONTROLS

Arrow keys - move

Esc - Pause

Use mouse to select stuffs

LOL

There's also a PC version available, you can download that lol

leaderboard: https://globalstats.io/leaderboard/60f2ffa45f5e882b008b5125

IDK

Game made by JCxYIS ( Adopted from Package FEEL (from Unity Asset Store) demo  )

Music mixed by ShouLun
